sentence.Network_en: He felt once more that he was no match for her in selfcontrol and subtlety.
sentence.Network_cn: 他又一次觉得自己在涵养和机智上都不是她的对手.

entry.def: Self-control is the ability to not show your feelings or not do the things that your feelings make you want to do.

example.ex: His self-control, reserve and aloofness were almost inhuman...
example.tran: 他自制、矜持和冷漠得几乎有些不近人情。

example.ex: I began to wish  I'd shown more self-control.
example.tran: 我开始想当时若是更自制一些就好了。
